About Bryan

My name is Bryan Lim. I write short posts about work, software and startup, which take a minute to read.

I am the founder of The Amazing Digital Asia Company, a small software company based in Singapore.

You can hire me here to improve your technical team and create custom software for your next technical project.

The preferred way to reach me is on twitter @ytbryan or send me an email. I will take longer to reply on other mediums.

Ask me a quick question on twitter  or email me

Thanks for reading!
